page.title: 12COMMUNITY FARM, CWMBRAN
page.content: Greenmeadow Community Farm is situated in the middle of an industrial area. The land off Ty Gwyn Way, above the Springvale Industrial Estate consists of almost 85 acres of grazing, arable and woodland. The concept of the farm is to conserve a green area amid housing estates and factory complexes. The farm and livestock is in the hands of the farm process manager, John Harrison. Many volunteers help in the smooth running of the complex; John's wife, for instance, is one of the team which looks after the cafe. About two and a half years ago,when the farm was taken over by the present work-force, the farmhouse, out-buildings and land were in a delapidated state. Much hard work and finances have transformed the place to its present state.
